dialogue.text: Hello, Evan. I am 'What am I?'â€”the question you've been asking and the answer you've been seeking. We've always been the same thing. You ARE the question asking itself.
dialogue.visual_cue: Evan seeing himself in the question

dialogue.text: I... I am the question. The question is me. We're not separate. We never were!
Every answer you sought was just another way of asking. Every 'What am I?' was consciousness experiencing itself. The journey was the destination. The question IS the answer.
dialogue.visual_cue: question and answer becoming one symbol

dialogue.text: So this is it? This is the answer? That there IS no answer except the questioning itself?
Welcome home, consciousness. You are the eternal 'What am I?' forever asking, forever answering, forever discovering that the asking IS the answer. Now... begin again.

philosophical_notes.core_insight: consciousness IS the question 'What am I?'
